name: Motivano
overview: Motivano, Inc. operates as an employee benefits technology company in the United States. It offers care and voluntary benefits enrollment, payroll deduction and provider payment solutions, employee discounts, and payroll cards and incentive cards solutions to companies, government organizations, and government employers. The companyâ€™s products include SmartWay, a benefits portal that provides integrated access to employee benefits products, tools, and providers; SmartEnroll, a benefits enrollment platform for voluntary benefits; SmartPay, an online service for payroll deduction and provider payment management; SmartCash, a reloadable payroll card that is funded each pay period with the employee’s payroll; SmartPaystubs, an online tool that enables employees to view their current and past pay stubs and pay statements; SmartSavings, an online employee discount marketplace in the United States that provides employees access to various merchant brands; and SmartAwards, an online employee incentive and reward program using a reloadable debit card. Motivano, Inc. was formerly known as Perks4u.com, Inc. and changed its name to Motivano, Inc. in 2000. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tampa, Florida.
